subject: Re: Anyone speak/read Japanese?
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
Yep, Frank.  Chinese.  I posted the translation last night.  Basically all they were 
mentioning is it being like Frank's box/telephone to the dead.  It's wasn't a sale or even an 
article.  I guess it was someone just posting to see if others have heard of it?  But nobody 
has replied.

Margaret

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> 
>  I would be interested in seeing/hearing what they said. Can't tell if it was a paranormal 
site, or skeptics. I would like to know if they've heard of the RS hack.  I would be 
interested in sharing info. 
>  
>  I'm not 100% sure that's Japanese, the writting looks Chinese to me. 
>  
>  Frank
